dialogues.text: Hmm.. So much to do... I'm running late for my delivery...
Could you please come back later? I'm a bit busy right now.
Say, girl, would you like to help me out here? I need to deliver some Lightwood to Duncan in Port Azure, 5 will do. Could you help me out?
Oh. Please check in again soon, I think we can help each other out!
Excellent! I'm Douglas by the way, welcome to my workshop! You will find trees which you can cut south-east of here in Sunrise Sands. Look for the weak palm trees.
Great! Thank you, I will deliver these to Duncan! Can I ask you one more favour? I promised to bring my wife Mary 5 fish.
You may use and keep my fishing rod. Could you please deliver these in my stead? She lives in Port Azure.
There is a fishing spot next to my house. Feel free to use it any time you please. Mary will happily reward you for your efforts.
